GSD.description:
xen/console: harden hvc_xen against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.296 by commit c7eaa5082bccfc00dfdb500ac6cc86d6f24ca027. For more details please see the references link.
